result.title: Unable to access group contest submissions
result.content:
Greetings.
At the moment, I'm participating in 1st Hunger Games,
and I noticed that I'm not allowed to access my group(1st Hungar Games) submissions from my ordinary Submissions page. (The one displayed on the profile sidebar)

This is a minor bug, but it's sort of annoying
because now I either need to bookmark the contest page OR click through "GROUPS" -> "1st Hungar Games" -> "Contest".
Neither of which is really desirable.
